import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { faHouse } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { faHouse = faHouse; navbarOpen = false; toggleNavbar() { this.navbarOpen = !this.navbarOpen; } }
